#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Note.

== Name ==

*[CNote Note]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Note (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Generic type for addition of comments and/or rating.
			The text of the note is localised to a xml language.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  rating = [SRating Rating]>  [CLocalisedText comment]+  </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CLocalisedText golfml:LocalisedText] || [CLocalisedText comment] ||  					Localised, textual comment about the parent entitiy.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| rating ||  Simple rating of the parent entitiy || [SRating golfml:Rating] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CCountryClub CountryClub], [CGolfCourse GolfCourse], [CHole Hole], [CPlayer Player], [CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Note">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="comment" type="golfml:LocalisedText">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="rating" type="golfml:Rating">  </xs:attribute></xs:complexType>
----
